byline.contributor: Julie Turkewitz contributed reporting from Orlando. Susan Beachy contributed research.

abstract: Many police officers who responded to shooting massacre at Pulse nightclub in Orlando will likely need to seek counseling to manage their emotions about horrific event.
lead_paragraph: Officers at the scene of the massacre at Pulse are among the responders who are likely to require counseling to find the will to return to work.

headline.main: ‘I Thought They Were Playing Dead’: Officers Are Haunted by Scene at Orlando Club
headline.print_headline: Police Officers Are Haunted by Grisly Scene Inside Orlando Club

snippet: Officers at the scene of the massacre at Pulse are among the responders who are likely to require counseling to find the will to return to work.
